title: ICYMI - Keisha Lance Bottoms on Speaking Out Against Reopening Georgia
itunes:title: ICYMI - Keisha Lance Bottoms on Speaking Out Against Reopening Georgia
description:
Atlanta Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms argues Georgia Governor Brian Kemp's decision to reopen the state's economy is premature and counterproductive.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
